nodes.bodyText: I don't think the irida version should be a menu item. Even if it is disabled

nodes.bodyText: Just a question. What does the && represent?
It is basically a shortcut operator in this case for a ternary.  There are some cases where this is bad, but it works here.
in other words it is equibalent to isAdmin ? <Compenonet .../> : null}
The more I see these styles with display "flex" I really think we should make separate file in styles directory for them. One for row reverse, one for justifyContent etc. What do you think?
As discussed we will think on this for a later PR if need be

The user can set the properties in irida.conf or styles.properties correct? Do we want to allow the user to mix and put some styles in both files? I think this if and the if blocl below should be changed to an if/else block
